title: Searge: 今天可能有快照&随后2~3周无快照
author: obby825
txt_content:
Searge: The plan is to have a snapshot out today, ideally within a few hours. Still need to solve one serious issue that causes holes in the world.
Searge: 计划：今天发布快照，理想情况下会是在几个小时以内。我依然需要解决一个棘手的问题，它会导致世界中产生洞。
Searge: After today the snapshots decided to take a break, go on vacation and celebrate christmas, so they will not be around for 2-3 weeks.
Searge: 在今天的快照后打算休息一下，度假并庆祝圣诞节，所以2-3周左右不会有快照。
